entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as 'Potter' later in the text.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Harry's father, mentioned along with his mother and Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, mentioned along with Harry's parents.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: A Death Eater, mentioned as having a conversation with Dolohov.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: A Death Eater, mentioned as having a conversation with Yaxley.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts, mentioned by Dolohov.

relationships.description: Yaxley and Dolohov are having a conversation, as mentioned in the text: '“Deﬁnitely heard something,” said Yaxley. “Animal, d’you reckon?”' and 'That head case Hagrid kept a whole bunch of stuﬀ in here,’ said Dolohov...'
Yaxley mentions Hagrid, as mentioned in the text: '“That head case Hagrid kept a whole bunch of stuﬀ in here,” said Dolohov...'
Dolohov mentions Hagrid, as mentioned in the text: 'That head case Hagrid kept a whole bunch of stuﬀ in here,' said Dolohov...
Yaxley is concerned about Potter, as mentioned in the text: '“Time’s nearly up. Potter’s had his hour. He’s not coming.”'
Dolohov is also concerned about Potter, as mentioned in the text: '“And he was sure he’d come! He won’t be happy.”'
